data.text: @e17RnR_books @stowtradeshall @WhiteRabbitBks @leebrackstone @Confingo Definitely keen to come to the reschedule date. Who knows, by then the trains might be running!
@philternz @stowtradeshall @WhiteRabbitBks @leebrackstone @Confingo I was confident that at least you wouldn’t have had a problem with the Tube strike.

@e17RnR_books @stowtradeshall @WhiteRabbitBks @leebrackstone @Confingo That sucks! I guess that had to happen, it being my first one in months (years?) All the best to Michael, and see you on the 16th.
@simonfspeak @stowtradeshall @WhiteRabbitBks @leebrackstone @Confingo Sorry Simon, happy to refund if the new date doesn’t work. I was really looking forward to Thursday.
@leebrackstone @stowtradeshall @WhiteRabbitBks @Confingo We’ve had a fair run on recent months. I had hoped the Tube strike could be overcome but this is a double whammy…
@e17RnR_books @stowtradeshall @WhiteRabbitBks @leebrackstone @Confingo Sorry to hear that - get well soon Michael
